leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 化学-反应预测与逆合成生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 清洗→预测→规划→路线评估→benchmark
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 预测/规划器 + 数据/评测

queries: [WEB] chemical reaction prediction deep learning github
[WEB] graph neural network reaction prediction github

tools.name: Reagents
tools.one_line_profile: Reagent prediction model using Molecular Transformer
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting reagents in chemical reactions using a Molecular Transformer architecture, improving data for reaction product prediction in a self-supervised fashion.

tools.name: AutoWRFChem-Base
tools.one_line_profile: Automation workflow for running WRF-Chem simulations
tools.detailed_description: Stand-alone code to automatically run WRF-Chem simulations with NEI and MEGAN emissions and MOZART boundary conditions, facilitating atmospheric chemistry modeling.

tools.name: Reaction Condition Recommendation
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning model for reaction condition prediction
tools.detailed_description: Code for training and deploying machine learning models specifically designed to recommend reaction conditions for organic chemistry reactions.

tools.name: Equivariant-Graph-Transformer
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid EGNN and Transformer for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep neural network architecture combining Equivariant Graph Neural Networks (EGNN) and Transformers for accurate prediction of molecular properties.

tools.name: SMILES Transformer
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-trained molecular fingerprinting using Transformers
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the SMILES Transformer for generating pre-trained molecular fingerprints, useful for low-data drug discovery tasks.

tools.name: MPerformer
tools.one_line_profile: SE(3) Transformer-based Molecular Perceptron
tools.detailed_description: An SE(3) Transformer-based model designed for molecular property prediction, leveraging geometric deep learning.

tools.name: WGFormer
tools.one_line_profile: SE(3)-Transformer for molecular conformation prediction
tools.detailed_description: An SE(3)-Transformer driven by Wasserstein Gradient Flows for predicting molecular ground-state conformations.

tools.name: Llamol
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamic multi-conditional generative transformer for molecular design
tools.detailed_description: A generative transformer model capable of de novo molecular design conditioned on multiple dynamic properties.

tools.name: t5chem
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based model for chemical reaction tasks
tools.detailed_description: A unified Transformer-based model (T5) for various chemical reaction tasks including reaction prediction, retrosynthesis, and property prediction.

tools.name: HeadTailAssign
tools.one_line_profile: Head and tail atom assignment for monomers/polymers
tools.detailed_description: A utility to assign head and tail atom positions in monomeric units or polymerization reactions represented in SMILES format, facilitating polymer informatics.

tools.name: ChemCoTBench
tools.one_line_profile: LLM Reasoning Benchmark & Dataset for Chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark and Chain-of-Thoughts dataset designed to evaluate Large Language Models on chemistry reasoning tasks.

tools.name: ABT-MPNN
tools.one_line_profile: Atom-bond transformer-based MPNN for molecular properties
tools.detailed_description: An Atom-Bond Transformer-based Message Passing Neural Network (ABT-MPNN) for accurate molecular property prediction.

tools.name: TyphoFormer
tools.one_line_profile: LLM-Augmented Transformer for Typhoon Track Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A spatial-temporal transformer model augmented with LLMs for predicting typhoon tracks, serving the domain of meteorology and earth science.

tools.name: Organic Reaction Prediction NMT
tools.one_line_profile: NMT-based organic reaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Neural Machine Translation (NMT) with attention mechanisms for predicting organic chemistry reactions.

tools.name: Levenshtein SMILES Augmentation
tools.one_line_profile: Data augmentation tool for chemical reaction datasets using Levenshtein distance
tools.detailed_description: A Python utility for augmenting reaction SMILES datasets by applying Levenshtein distance-based modifications, developed by MolecularAI (AstraZeneca) to improve robustness of chemical reaction models.

tools.name: Deep Molecular Optimization
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular optimization framework using Seq2Seq and Transformers
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for molecular optimization that captures chemical intuition using Sequence-to-Sequence models with attention mechanisms and Transformers, facilitating de novo molecular design.

tools.name: EvalRetro
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking framework for single-step retrosynthesis algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive repository for evaluating and benchmarking various single-step retrosynthesis prediction algorithms, providing standardized metrics and datasets for chemical synthesis research.

tools.name: SiGra
tools.one_line_profile: Single-cell spatial elucidation using image-augmented graph transformers
tools.detailed_description: A tool for single-cell spatial analysis that integrates histology images and gene expression data using a graph transformer model to elucidate spatial domains and cell-cell interactions.

tools.name: GET
tools.one_line_profile: Generalist Equivariant Transformer for 3D molecular interaction learning
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Generalist Equivariant Transformer (GET) for modeling 3D molecular interactions, applicable to tasks like protein-ligand binding and molecular property prediction.

tools.name: MEGANet
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-scale Edge-Guided Attention Network for polyp segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning model for medical image segmentation, specifically designed for polyp detection in colonoscopy images using multi-scale edge-guided attention mechanisms.

tools.name: Meganet.m
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB library for Deep Learning as Optimal Control (SciML)
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB framework implementing deep learning architectures as discretized optimal control problems (ODEs), widely used in scientific machine learning and inverse problems.

tools.name: EnvRtype
tools.one_line_profile: R toolkit for environmental characterization and genomic prediction
tools.detailed_description: An R package for collecting environmental data from GIS platforms and performing environmental characterization, specifically designed for genomic prediction of reaction norms in ecology and breeding.

tools.name: Rexgen Direct
tools.one_line_profile: Template-free prediction of organic reaction outcomes using graph neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A data-driven, template-free approach for predicting the outcomes of organic chemical reactions. It treats reaction prediction as a graph-to-graph translation problem, identifying reaction centers and generating product structures directly from reactant graphs without relying on predefined reaction templates.

tools.name: SolTranNet
tools.one_line_profile: Aqueous solubility prediction using molecular transformers
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool for predicting the aqueous solubility of organic molecules. It utilizes a Transformer-based architecture adapted for SMILES strings to estimate LogS values, aiding in drug discovery and chemical property screening.

tools.name: MALT
tools.one_line_profile: High-throughput sequence alignment tool for metagenomics
tools.detailed_description: MALT (MEGAN Alignment Tool) is a sequence alignment and analysis tool designed for processing high-throughput sequencing data, specifically for metagenomic analysis.

tools.name: MEGAN Community Edition
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive tool for metagenomic data analysis and visualization
tools.detailed_description: MEGAN (MEtaGenome ANalyzer) is a comprehensive toolbox for interactively analyzing and comparing microbiome data, allowing users to explore the taxonomic and functional content of their data.

tools.name: GREAD
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Reaction-Diffusion Networks for modeling dynamic systems
tools.detailed_description: GREAD implements a graph neural network framework designed to model reaction-diffusion processes, applicable to physics and chemical dynamics simulations.

tools.name: synthesis-dags
tools.one_line_profile: Search algorithm over molecule synthesis DAGs for retrosynthesis
tools.detailed_description: Implements an approach to search over molecule synthesis Directed Acyclic Graphs (DAGs), facilitating single-step and multi-step retrosynthesis planning.

tools.name: LocalTransform
tools.one_line_profile: Predicting organic reaction outcomes using local graph transformations
tools.detailed_description: LocalTransform is a template-free reaction prediction model that predicts organic reactivity by learning local graph transformations.

tools.name: MolTrans
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular Interaction Transformer for Drug-Target Interaction Prediction
tools.detailed_description: MolTrans is a deep learning framework that uses substructure pattern mining and interaction modeling to predict drug-target interactions.

tools.name: Deep-Synthesis
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for chemical synthesis prediction
tools.detailed_description: A framework utilizing sequence-to-sequence models for predicting chemical reaction outcomes and retrosynthetic pathways.

tools.name: Retrosynthesis-Prediction
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based retrosynthesis prediction with data augmentation
tools.detailed_description: Implements Transformer sequence-to-sequence models for retrosynthesis prediction, incorporating SMILES-based data augmentation techniques.

tools.name: MoleculeDiffusionTransformer
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular generation using diffusion and autoregressive transformers
tools.detailed_description: A model for generating molecular structures combining diffusion models with autoregressive transformer architectures, developed at MIT.

tools.name: RXNGraphormer
tools.one_line_profile: Unified framework for reaction performance prediction and synthesis planning
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of RXNGraphormer, a pre-trained deep learning framework designed for cross-task chemical reaction performance prediction and synthesis planning.

tools.name: Graph-DiT
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Diffusion Transformer for Multi-Conditional Molecular Generation
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Graph Diffusion Transformer (Graph-DiT) for generating molecular graphs under multiple conditions.

tools.name: Transformer-M
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer model for understanding 2D and 3D molecular data
tools.detailed_description: Transformer-M is a versatile molecular model that can process and understand both 2D topology and 3D geometric structures of molecules.

tools.name: OChemR
tools.one_line_profile: Optical Chemical Recognition for converting reaction images to SMILES
tools.detailed_description: OChemR uses Vision Transformers (DETR) to detect and classify molecules, text, and arrows in chemical reaction images, converting them into SMILES representations.

tools.name: Graphormer
tools.one_line_profile: General-purpose deep learning backbone for molecular modeling
tools.detailed_description: Graphormer is a graph transformer model designed as a general-purpose backbone for various molecular modeling tasks, including property prediction and conformational analysis.

tools.name: MEGAN (Molecule Edit Graph Attention Network)
tools.one_line_profile: Modeling chemical reactions as sequences of graph edits
tools.detailed_description: MEGAN models chemical reactions by predicting a sequence of graph edits to transform reactants into products, useful for reaction prediction.

tools.name: MolecularTransformerEmbeddings
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer for translating molecular text representations and embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A Transformer neural network trained to translate between different molecular text representations (e.g., SMILES, IUPAC) and generate molecular embeddings.

tools.name: citationchaser
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for forward and backward citation chasing in systematic reviews
tools.detailed_description: An R package and Shiny app for performing forward and backward citation chasing as part of an evidence synthesis project, helping researchers identify relevant literature.

tools.name: nerfacc
tools.one_line_profile: General NeRF acceleration toolbox
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch toolbox for accelerating Neural Radiance Fields (NeRF) training and rendering, providing efficient sampling and rendering modules for 3D reconstruction research.

tools.name: nerfstudio
tools.one_line_profile: Modular framework for Neural Radiance Fields development
tools.detailed_description: A collaboration-friendly studio for NeRFs, providing a modular API to create, train, and visualize NeRFs, standardizing the workflow for 3D reconstruction research.

tools.name: Difix3D
tools.one_line_profile: 3D reconstruction improvement using diffusion models
tools.detailed_description: A tool for improving 3D reconstructions using single-step diffusion models, specifically addressing artifacts in 3D geometry generation.

tools.name: TransVAE
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based VAE for molecular design
tools.detailed_description: A Transformer-based Variational Autoencoder (VAE) architecture designed for de novo molecular design, enabling the generation of novel chemical structures.

tools.name: PDEBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for scientific machine learning (PDEs)
tools.detailed_description: An extensive benchmark for Scientific Machine Learning (SciML), providing datasets and code for solving Partial Differential Equations (PDEs) using various neural network architectures.

tools.name: MultiStepRetrosynthesisTTL
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-step retrosynthesis prediction tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for multi-step retrosynthesis planning based on Augmented Disconnection Aware Triple Transformer Loop Predictions, facilitating synthetic route design.

tools.name: rxn_yields
tools.one_line_profile: Chemical reaction yield prediction and data augmentation
tools.detailed_description: A library for predicting chemical reaction yields using machine learning models, including data augmentation strategies to improve prediction accuracy.

tools.name: rxnaamapper
tools.one_line_profile: Reaction atom-mapping via language modelling
tools.detailed_description: A tool for mapping atoms between reactants and products in chemical reactions using language models, essential for reaction mechanism understanding.

tools.name: rxnmapper
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised attention-guided atom-mapping tool
tools.detailed_description: An unsupervised tool for extracting atom-mapping information from chemical reactions using attention mechanisms in Transformers, aiding in reaction grammar extraction.

tools.name: mist
tools.one_line_profile: MS/MS spectra encoder for molecular property inference
tools.detailed_description: A tool for encoding Mass Spectrometry (MS/MS) spectra using formula transformers to infer molecular properties, aiding in metabolite identification.

tools.name: reaction_yield_nn
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty-aware chemical reaction yield prediction
tools.detailed_description: A graph neural network implementation for predicting chemical reaction yields with uncertainty quantification.

tools.name: egt
tools.one_line_profile: Edge-Augmented Graph Transformer library
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Edge-Augmented Graph Transformers, a neural network architecture effective for modeling molecular graphs and other structured scientific data.

tools.name: egt_pytorch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of Edge-Augmented Graph Transformer
tools.detailed_description: PyTorch implementation of the Edge-Augmented Graph Transformer, facilitating its application in tasks like molecular property prediction.

tools.name: UnboundedNeRFPytorch
tools.one_line_profile: Unbounded and large-scale NeRF implementation
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation for training Neural Radiance Fields (NeRF) on unbounded 360-degree scenes, useful for large-scale 3D environment reconstruction.

tools.name: DirectVoxGO
tools.one_line_profile: Fast radiance field reconstruction via voxel grid optimization
tools.detailed_description: A tool for fast Neural Radiance Field (NeRF) reconstruction using direct voxel grid optimization, significantly speeding up training and rendering times.

tools.name: ORDerly
tools.one_line_profile: Cleaning and extraction tool for Open Reaction Database
tools.detailed_description: A library for extracting, cleaning, and benchmarking chemical reaction data from the Open Reaction Database (ORD), facilitating data-driven chemistry research.

tools.name: pixel-nerf
tools.one_line_profile: NeRF from one or few images
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of PixelNeRF, a learning framework that predicts continuous neural scene representations from one or a few input images.

tools.name: linchemin
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for linked chemical information and route analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit for processing linked chemical reaction data, providing interfaces to computer-aided synthesis prediction (CASP) tools and metrics for synthetic route analysis.

tools.name: ReLM
tools.one_line_profile: Language models for chemical reaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: A framework leveraging pre-trained language models to enhance chemical reaction prediction tasks, demonstrating the application of NLP techniques in chemistry.

tools.name: taichi-nerfs
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance NeRF implementations using Taichi
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Neural Radiance Field (NeRF) variants implemented using Taichi and PyTorch, focusing on high-performance rendering and training.

tools.name: grover
tools.one_line_profile: Self-supervised graph transformer for molecular data
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of GROVER, a self-supervised graph transformer pre-trained on large-scale molecular data for learning rich molecular representations.
